Refresh the Page  if It is not Loading

Mobile - https://www.construct.net/en/free-online-games/fallout-new-dawn-0-9-8-demo-22839/play

Green Items = Pickups

WASD move

R use stimpack Right click to use Grenade

Here is the Lore and Item descriptions https://fallout-new-dawn-fangame.fandom.com/wiki/Fallout_new_dawn_(fangame)_Wiki

And here is my youtube https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VkojGqw25Wc&t=89s

Prologue:

You play as one of vault 12, you had a chance to join the brotherhood of steel and become a hero! The thing is, you have lost your mind and lost all your memory in a mission to destroy all the Enclave in California. You are now just a lonely scavenger who somehow walked there way to the mojave desert, you end up finding a similar looking vault as vault 13 and you slowly begin to gain your memories back. You managed to somehow find out about the brotherhood of steel again and the Raiders taking over the Mojave desert. All of the NCR and all the factions except the Brotherhood of steel had been wiped out by the Raiders. You have been sent out by the Brotherhood of steel as a spy to finally put a end to these raiders once in for all. You end up in a unknown region of the Mojave desert stranded only with remaining members of the Brotherhood of steel. Somehow this area was part of a Vault tec experiments with clones. You also find a replica of vault 13 here, You find yourself a suit only to find the rest of your team dead.
